definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: Don't hold your breath or cinch the tape too tight.
sentences.chinese: 不要屏住呼息，也不要把卷尺勒的太緊。

sentences.english: The carpenter extended the measuring tape as far as it would go.
sentences.chinese: 木匠把卷尺拉長到不能再拉爲止。

sentences.english: South Korea KOMELON steel-ball club, mainly for the production of high-grade tape.
sentences.chinese: 韓國KOMELON珠式會社，主要爲生產高檔卷尺。

definition: set square (tool to measure right angles)
level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
